articles.description: France are the first team through to the round of 16, thanks to Kylian Mbappe, whose brace saw Les Bleus overcome the challenge from Denmark.
articles.content:
RAS ABU ABOUD, Qatar -- France are the first team to book their place in the round of 16 at the 2022 World Cup after beating Denmark 2-1 on Saturday thanks to a brace from Kylian Mbappe.
- World Cup… [+9027 chars]
